meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stephanie Garrone-Shufran Robin Devereux Kevin Shrum Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7494.

td.p: Stephanie Garrone-Shufran, a teacher educator from Woburn, Massachusetts
Robin Devereux, an art dealer from Durham, North Carolina
Kevin Shrum, a retired adjunct professor from Fort Collins, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,500)

tr.td: RECENT BESTSELLERS
GRAINS
DECODING THE HITMAKING BAND
POTPOURRI
ON THE BALLOT
PREPOSITION 5

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On the nonfiction list, Phil Knight\'s book title says it all: "Shoe Dog: A Memoir by the Creator of" this')

StephanieWho is Figaro?

KevinWho is ?
$6,601
RobinWho is Picard?
$10,401
Figaro')
